subject: Don't use -fpie flag for shared libraries
commitMessage:
Don't use -fpie flag for shared libraries

With this flag enabled dynamic linker fails with error message:
"<shared library path>: unexpected reloc type 0x03"

Change-Id: I017c489729399cea171d8b6cc108af364074d6e1
Signed-off-by: Jacek Bukarewicz <j.bukarewicz@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Verified on M0, I also checked if it builds on ia32.
